name: Boogie Woogie Red
description: '''Boogie Woogie Red''' (October 18, 1925 â€“ July 2, 1992) was an American [[Detroit blues]], [[boogie-woogie]] and [[jazz]] pianist, singer and songwriter. At different times he worked with [[Sonny Boy Williamson I]], [[Washboard Willie]], [[Baby Boy Warren]], [[Lonnie Johnson (musician)|Lonnie Johnson]], [[Tampa Red]], [[John Lee Hooker]] and [[Memphis Slim]].
